name: InlineImageSplitTextAbout
description: About section with dynamic heading composed of alternating text and inline image segments.

heading[].content.note: Each text segment in the heading array

heading[].src.note: Supports local paths and external URLs. External URLs are rendered with unoptimized flag.

heading[].alt.note: Optional alt text for images. Omit or use empty string for decorative images (aria-hidden=true when empty).

headingRules.note: heading array can contain any number of text and image segments in any order. Images automatically alternate rotation direction (1st: -rotate-12, 2nd: rotate-12, etc.).

buttonRules.note: Button variant controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. Border radius controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius.

propsSchema.heading: Array<{ type: 'text'; content: string } | { type: 'image'; src: string; alt?: string }>
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{ text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string, props?: Partial<ButtonPropsForVariant<CTAButtonVariant>> }>

usageExample:
// Wrap in ThemeProvider
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="text-stagger" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="rounded" background="aurora" cardStyle="glass-elevated" primaryButtonStyle="gradient" secondaryButtonStyle="glass">
  <InlineImageSplitTextAbout heading={[{ type: 'text', content: 'Building the future with' }, { type: 'image', src: '/brand/logo.png', alt: 'Company logo' }, { type: 'text', content: 'innovative solutions' }]} useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} buttons={[{ text: 'Get Started', href: '/signup' }, { text: 'Learn More', href: '/about' }]} />
</ThemeProvider>
